statements: SELECT * FROM location_history;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_history WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM location_history WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -80;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM location_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, timestamp FROM location_history WHERE latitude < 30 AND longitude > -90 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_history WHERE latitude > 50 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT count(*), AVG(latitude), MIN(longitude) FROM location_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude, COUNT(*) as num_records FROM location_history GROUP BY device_id HAVING num_records > 100 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) as num_records FROM location_history GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY num_records ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE device_id = '1234-5678'
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM devices WHERE active = TRUE
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT device_name, active FROM devices WHERE owner_id = '98765432-12ab-34cd-56ef-123456789000' AND active = true ORDER BY device_name
SELECT device_name, active, owner_id FROM devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'iPhone%' OR device_name LIKE '%Android%' ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59'
SELECT * FROM location_history WHERE device_name = 'iPhone' ORDER BY location_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_history WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -70;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'mobile' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'john%' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, phone_number FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_history WHERE device_name = 'iPhone' ORDER BY location_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_name, location_timestamp FROM location_history WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY location_timestamp ASC
SELECT location_timestamp, device_name FROM location_history WHERE longitude BETWEEN -90 AND -80 AND latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY device_name
SELECT * FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'smartphone' AND os_version LIKE 'iOS%' ORDER BY device_name LIMIT 5
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY username
SELECT * FROM device_locations;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, os FROM devices WHERE last_active > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_history WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT device_name, os FROM devices WHERE last_active > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY last_active DESC;
SELECT device_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM device_locations WHERE longitude < 0;

SELECT users.username, devices.device_name, location_history.location_name FROM users JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id JOIN location_history ON devices.device_id = location_history.device_id;
SELECT * FROM location_history;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, longitude, latitude FROM location_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_name, os_version FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM location_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, os_version, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions WHERE permission_id > 5 ORDER BY permission_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, user_id FROM device_users GROUP BY device_id, user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
